name: Wallet Portfolio
description: Get detailed information about all tokens held in a wallet. Useful when you need to check a user's current token balances.

name: Token Information
description: Get token information by name or ticker. Useful when you need to find the contract address for a token.

name: Rugcheck Token Information
description: Get detailed token information including creator details, supply, top holders, and insiders information. Provides insights about token creator, active supply, insider holders, and liquidity markets.

name: Fluxbeam Token Price
description: Get the current price of a token in USD (USD) from FluxBeam.

name: Birdeye Token Trending
description: Get a list of top trending tokens on Solana with prices, market caps, and volume data.

name: Birdeye All Time Trades
description: Get comprehensive trade statistics (buys, sells, volumes) of all time for a specific token on Solana.

name: CoinMarketCap Crypto News
description: Get the latest crypto news from CoinMarketCap.

name: Crypto.News Memecoins News
description: Get the latest memecoin news from Crypto.news.

name: GeckoTerminal Trending Pump Tokens
description: Get the latest trending tokens from the Pump.fun category on GeckoTerminal.

name: CoinGecko Global Crypto Data
description: Get global cryptocurrency market data including market cap, volume, and dominance percentages.

name: CoinGecko Trending Crypto & NFT
description: Get top trending coins and NFTs on CoinGecko based on user searches and trading volume.

name: CoinGecko Exchange Rates
description: Get Bitcoin-to-currency exchange rates for major cryptocurrencies, fiat currencies, and commodities.

name: CoinGecko Coin Data
description: Get detailed market data (price, volume, market cap) for a specific cryptocurrency. Provide the coin name like 'bitcoin', 'ethereum', or 'solana'.

name: CoinMarketCap Trending Coins
description: Get a list of all active cryptocurrencies with latest market data from CoinMarketCap.

name: DexScreener Top Boosted Tokens
description: Get the tokens with most active boosts on DexScreener, showing popularity and trending projects.

name: DexScreener Token Information
description: Get detailed DEX information about Solana tokens including price, volume, liquidity, and trading activity.

name: Jupiter Token Price
description: Get the current price of one or more Solana tokens in USD from Jupiter. Provide comma-separated token addresses.

name: Jupiter Token Metadata
description: Get detailed token information and metadata for a specific Solana token from Jupiter. Provides details like name, symbol, decimals, and other token attributes.

name: Solana Send SOL
description: Send SOL from agent wallet to a specified Solana address.

name: Solana Send SPL Tokens
description: Send SPL tokens from agent wallet to a specified Solana address.

name: Solana Burn Tokens
description: Burn SPL tokens from agent wallet, permanently removing them from circulation.

name: Jupiter Swap (Buy/Sell)
description: Swap tokens on Solana using Jupiter. Provide the input token, output token, amount, and slippage (default 10%).

name: Pump.fun Launch Coin
description: Launch a new token on Pump.fun platform. Requires token details and agent wallet information.
